      Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Actor.fire(Event event)
      Sets this actor as the event target and propagates the event to this actor and ancestor actors as necessary.

      Try to handle the given event, if it is applicable.

      class  CountdownEventAction<T extends Event>
      An EventAction that is complete once it receives X number of events.
      class  EventAction<T extends Event>
      Adds a listener to the actor for a specific event type and does not complete until EventAction.handle(Event) returns true.
